question: What parts of a Halal animal are Haram to eat?
answer:
QUESTION
I have heard that in all Halal animals, there are 7 things that are Haraam to consume. For example blood, testicles, part of shit, part of urine etc. Kindly list all and verify whether the testicles are haram or not.
ANSWER


Share:
Q: Which parts of the animal are prohibited to consume?
A: Seven parts of the animal are prohibited to consume: a) male genitals, b) female genitals, c) testicles, d) the bladder, e) gall bladder, f) glands, g) spinal marrow. (Ahsanul Fataawa vol. 7 pg. 406)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
